newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil halts trade of Banco Progresso shrs.
newsitem.headline: Brazil halts trade of Banco Progresso shrs.

text.p: Brazilian stock exchanges on Friday halted trade in Minas Gerais-based private bank Banco Progresso as the bank was liquidated by the Central Bank, a spokeswoman for the Sao Paulo bolsa said.
Earlier today, the Central Bank announced it closed the bank and its leasing unit for financial difficulties.
Central Bank director Claudio Mauch said the liquidation of Banco Progresso has nothing to do with the bank's investigation into alleged fraud at other banks and brokerages.
((-- Fatima Cristina, Rio de Janeiro Newsroom 5521 5074151))
